sentence.Network_en: Mediastinal lymph nodes were usually hyperemic and enlarged.

sentence.Network_en: This is a more typical acute gastritis with a diffusely hyperemic gastric mucosa.

sentence.Network_en: Cystoscopic examination was performed in every patient and showed mass - like, edematous, ulcerative or hyperemic mucosa lesions.
